name: Dementium: The Ward
description: Dementium tells the tale of a man who awakens to find himself alone, with no memories of his past, in a derelict hospital that is frozen in time. Confronted by the deadly, grotesque surgical experiments that wander the halls, a series of challenging puzzles and a cast of peculiar characters, he must face his deepest fears, unlock the mysteries of the hospital, and escape with his life.
